title: National Theatre Live: Follies
occurrences: Every year, between the wars, I staged a Follies in this theatre
We played the clubs a while, but after dancing in the Follies...
...and then the Follies closed. I never missed it, Ben, not really
See, I had a Follies number once, a solo, and they cut the goddamn thing in Philadelphia
Hello, folks, we're into the Follies! First, though, folks, we'll pause for a mo'
